    <title>Pythagorean Theorem Illustration</title>
    <!-- Right Triangle -->
    <polygon points="100,400 100,100 400,400" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>

    <!-- Labels for sides -->
    <text x="250" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">c</text>
    <text x="50" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">b</text>
    <text x="250" y="450" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">a</text>

    <!-- Square on side a -->
    <rect x="400" y="400" width="300" height="300" fill="red" fill-opacity="0.3" stroke="red" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="550" y="550" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="red">a^2</text>

    <!-- Square on side b -->
    <rect x="100" y="-200" width="300" height="300" fill="blue" fill-opacity="0.3" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="250" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="blue">b^2</text>

    <!-- Square on side c -->
    <rect x="100" y="100" width="424" height="424" fill="green" fill-opacity="0.3" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="300" y="350" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="green">c^2</text>

    <!-- Dashed-lines for visual proof -->
    <line x1="100" y1="400" x2="500" y2="100" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="800" y2="400" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" stroke-width="1"/>

    <!-- Equation annotation -->
    <text x="300" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">a^2 + b^2 = c^2</text>

    <text x="490" y="30" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">Red: a</text>

<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Right Triangle -->
  <polygon points="100,450 100,350 200,450" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Right Angle Notation -->
  <polyline points="100,450 110,450 110,440" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Labels for the sides -->
  <text x="80" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">a</text>
  <text x="150" y="470" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">b</text>
  <text x="140" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">c</text>
  
  <!-- Arrows for Formula Connection -->
  <line x1="75" y1="390" x2="100" y2="350" stroke="gray" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  <line x1="160" y1="455" x2="200" y2="450" stroke="gray" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  <line x1="120" y1="390" x2="150" y2="400" stroke="gray" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  
  <!-- Arrows Marker Definition -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="0" refY="3" orient="auto" markerUnits="strokeWidth">
      <path d="M0,0 L0,6 L9,3 z" fill="gray" />
    </marker>
  </defs>

  <!-- Formula a^2 + b^2 = c^2 -->
  <text x="400" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="28">a² + b² = c²</text>
  
  <!-- Squares on each side -->
  <!-- Square for 'a' -->
  <rect x="60" y="350" width="40" height="40" fill="lightblue" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="65" y="375" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="blue">a²</text>
  
  <!-- Square for 'b' -->
  <rect x="200" y="415" width="50" height="50" fill="lightgreen" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="215" y="445" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="green">b²</text>
  
  <!-- Square for 'c' -->
  <rect x="100" y="300" width="100" height="100" fill="lightcoral" stroke="red" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="130" y="355" font-family="Arial" font-size="22" fill="red">c²</text>
  
  <!-- Example calculation -->
  <polyline points="400,450 400,330 500,450" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="380" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">3</text>
  <text x="460" y="470" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">4</text>
  <text x="460" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">5</text>
  
  <text x="580" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="18">
    3² + 4² = 9 + 16 = 25
  </text>
  <text x="580" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="18">
    5² = 25
  </text>
  
  <!-- Real-world application -->
  <line x1="650" y1="450" x2="750" y2="450" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="750" y1="450" x2="750" y2="350" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="650" y1="450" x2="750" y2="350" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="670" y="455" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">Ladder</text>
  <text x="705" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">Wall</text>
  <text x="660" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Height</text>
</svg>

<svg width="300" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Draw circle -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <!-- Draw center dot and label 'O' -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="3" fill="black" />
  <text x="155" y="145" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">O</text>
  <!-- Draw radius line and label 'r' -->
  <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="250" y2="150" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="200" y="145" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="blue">r</text>
  <!-- Draw diameter line and label 'd' -->
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="250" y2="150" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="150" y="165" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="green">d</text>
  <!-- Add '2r' bracket for diameter -->
  <text x="135" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="green">2r</text>
  <!-- Draw circumference indication with dashed circle -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="100" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" fill="none" />
  <!-- Label circumference as 'C' -->
  <text x="110" y="55" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="red">C</text>
  <!-- Add formulas -->
  <text x="180" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">d = 2r</text>
  <text x="180" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">C = πd</text>
</svg>

<svg width="400" height="400" viewBox="-2 -2 4 4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Unit Circle -->
  <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="1" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Axes -->
  <line x1="-1.5" y1="0" x2="1.5" y2="0" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line x1="0" y1="-1.5" x2="0" y2="1.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Unit Markings -->
  <line x1="0.5" y1="0.05" x2="0.5" y2="-0.05" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line x1="-0.5" y1="0.05" x2="-0.5" y2="-0.05" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line y1="0.5" x1="0.05" x2="-0.05" y2="0.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line y1="-0.5" x1="0.05" x2="-0.05" y2="-0.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Angle Lines -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Angle Projections to Axes for 45° / π/4 -->
  <line x1="0.707" y1="0.707" x2="0.707" y2="0" stroke="blue" stroke-dasharray="0.02" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line x1="0.707" y1="0.707" x2="0" y2="0.707" stroke="blue" stroke-dasharray="0.02" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Marked Angles in Degrees and Radians -->
  <text x="1.1" y="0.05" font-size="0.1" fill="black">0° / 0</text>
  <text x="0.85" y="0.5" font-size="0.1" fill="black">30° / π/6</text>
  <text x="0.6" y="0.7" font-size="0.1" fill="black">45° / π/4</text>
  <text x="0.35" y="0.85" font-size="0.1" fill="black">60° / π/3</text>
  <text x="0.05" y="1.1" font-size="0.1" fill="black">90° / π/2</text>
  
  <!-- Quadrant Shades -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1" height="1" fill="lightgray" opacity="0.2" />
  <rect x="-1" y="0" width="1" height="1" fill="lightgray" opacity="0.2" />
  <rect x="-1" y="-1" width="1" height="1" fill="lightgray" opacity="0.2" />
  <rect x="0" y="-1" width="1" height="1" fill="lightgray" opacity="0.2" />

  <!-- Radius Label -->
  <text x="0.4" y="0.4" font-size="0.1" fill="black">r = 1</text>

  <!-- Diameter -->
  <line x1="-1" y1="0" x2="1" y2="0" stroke="green" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <text x="0" y="-0.1" font-size="0.1" fill="green" text-anchor="middle">Diameter = 2</text>

  <!-- Circumference Note -->
  <text x="0" y="-1.3" font-size="0.1" fill="black" text-anchor="middle">Circumference = 2π</text>
</svg>

<svg width="300" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Draw the circle -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />

  <!-- Mark the center -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="3" fill="black" />

  <!-- Draw the radius -->
  <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="250" y2="150" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="230" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">r</text>

  <!-- Draw the diameter -->
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="250" y2="150" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="150" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="blue" text-anchor="middle">d</text>

  <!-- Annotate circumference - full arc with dashed line -->
  <path d="M 250 150 A 100 100 0 1 1 250.01 150" fill="none" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <text x="150" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="green" text-anchor="middle">C</text>
  
  <!-- Legend -->
  <rect x="10" y="220" width="280" height="60" fill="none" stroke="gray" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="20" y="240" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="red">- Radius (r): Distance from center to edge</text>
  <text x="20" y="255" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="blue">- Diameter (d = 2r): Distance across circle through the center</text>
  <text x="20" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="green">- Circumference (C = 2πr): Total distance around the circle</text>
</svg>

    <!-- Draw the first angle -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="350" y2="200" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />

    <line x1="50" y1="200" x2="350" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />

    <!-- Optional: Draw arcs to indicate angle measurements -->
    <!-- Adjust arcs to be more representative of the angles -->

  <!-- Common angle marks -->
  <g fill="black" font-size="0.06">

    <text x="0.87" y="-0.5" font-size="0.06">π/6</text>
    <text x="0.72" y="-0.72" font-size="0.06">π/4</text>
    <text x="0.5" y="-0.87" font-size="0.06">π/3</text>
    <text x="0.1" y="-1.1" font-size="0.06">π/2</text>
  </g>

  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="1" y2="0" stroke="blue" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.7071" y2="-0.7071" stroke="blue" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Arc length indicating the portion -->

  <!-- Text for arc length relationship -->

  </text>
  <text x="-0.8" y="1.1" font-size="0.06" text-anchor="middle" fill="black">

  </text>

  <!-- Angle notation -->
  <text x="0.6" y="-0.35" font-size="0.06" fill="black" text-anchor="middle">θ = π/4</text>
</svg>

  <!-- Vertical line of symmetry -->

  <polygon points="100,150 150,50 50,50" fill="lightcoral" />
  <polygon points="100,250 150,350 50,350" fill="lightcoral" />

    <path d="M300 90 L290 60 L310 60 Z" transform="rotate(72 300 150)" />

  <path d="M300 150 A40 40 0 0 1 260 170" fill="none" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />

    <!-- Coordinate Axes -->
    <line x1="-1.5" y1="0" x2="1.5" y2="0" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.01" />
    <line x1="0" y1="-1.5" x2="0" y2="1.5" stroke="blue" stroke-width="0.01" />

    <!-- Mark Common Angles -->
    <text x="1.05" y="0" font-size="0.05" fill="black">0°</text>
    <text x="-1.15" y="0" font-size="0.05" fill="black">180°</text>
    <text x="0.02" y="1.05" font-size="0.05" fill="black">90°</text>
    <text x="0.02" y="-1.1" font-size="0.05" fill="black">270°</text>

    <!-- Example Angle (45° or π/4) -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.7071" y2="0.7071" stroke="green" stroke-width="0.01" />
    <text x="0.5" y="0.5" font-size="0.05" fill="black">45°</text>
    <circle cx="0.7071" cy="0.7071" r="0.02" fill="green" />

    <!-- Cosine and Sine Lines -->
    <line x1="0.7071" y1="0" x2="0.7071" y2="0.7071" stroke="purple" stroke-dasharray="0.01" />
    <line x1="0" y1="0.7071" x2="0.7071" y2="0.7071" stroke="orange" stroke-dasharray="0.01" />

    <!-- Text for Cosine and Sine -->
    <text x="0.4" y="0.02" font-size="0.05" fill="purple">cos(45°)</text>
    <text x="-0.12" y="0.6" font-size="0.05" fill="orange">sin(45°)</text>

    <!-- Symmetrical Properties -->
    <line x1="-0.7071" y1="-0.7071" x2="0.7071" y2="0.7071" stroke="gray" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.01" />
    <line x1="0.7071" y1="-0.7071" x2="-0.7071" y2="0.7071" stroke="gray" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.01" />

    <!-- Additional Annotations -->
    <text x="1.1" y="0.7" font-size="0.05" fill="black">(cos(θ), sin(θ))</text>
    <text x="-0.9" y="-0.9" font-size="0.05" fill="black">(-cos(θ), -sin(θ))</text>

    <!-- Highlighting key Symmetries -->
    <circle cx="1" cy="0" r="0.02" fill="blue" />

  <line x1="100" y1="200" x2="100" y2="400" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="5,5" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="190" y="420" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">b</text>
  <text x="80" y="300" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">h</text>
  
  <!-- Indicating base and height -->
  <line x1="100" y1="400" x2="300" y2="400" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="100" y1="200" x2="100" y2="400" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Step 2: Formula Introduction -->
  <text x="100" y="450" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">
    Area = (1/2) × base × height
  </text>
  
  <!-- Step 3: Different Triangle Configuration -->
  <polygon points="350,450 550,450 470,250" fill="lightgreen" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="470" y1="250" x2="470" y2="450" stroke="orange" stroke-dasharray="5,5" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="480" y="260" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">h'</text>
  <text x="460" y="470" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">b'</text>
  
  <!-- Step 4: Area Through Heron's Formula -->
  <polygon points="150,100 250,50 350,150" fill="pink" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="180" y="90" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">a</text>
  <text x="230" y="60" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">b</text>
  <text x="320" y="140" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">c</text>
  
  <text x="380" y="100" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">
    s = (a + b + c) / 2
  </text>
  <text x="380" y="130" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">
    Area = √[s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)]
  </text>
  
  <!-- Angle Notation -->
  <text x="295" y="195" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">∠A</text>
  <text x="350" y="445" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">∠B</text>
  <text x="150" y="420" font-family="Verdana" font-size="15" fill="black">∠C</text>
</svg>

  <rect x="100" y="50" width="200" height="150" fill="lightblue" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Labels for Length -->
  <text x="190" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">Length</text>
  <text x="190" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">Length</text>

  <!-- Labels for Width -->
  <text x="75" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black" transform="rotate(90 80, 125)">Width</text>
  <text x="305" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black" transform="rotate(90 310,125)">Width</text>

  <!-- Arrows for Length -->
  <line x1="120" y1="40" x2="280" y2="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" marker-start="url(#arrowhead)"/>
  <line x1="120" y1="225" x2="280" y2="225" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" marker-start="url(#arrowhead)"/>

  <!-- Arrows for Width -->
  <line x1="75" y1="70" x2="75" y2="180" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" marker-start="url(#arrowhead)"/>
  <line x1="305" y1="70" x2="305" y2="180" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" marker-start="url(#arrowhead)"/>

  <!-- Formula for perimeter -->
  <text x="100" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">Perimeter = 2 × (Length + Width)</text>

  <!-- Arrowhead definition -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="4" refX="0" refY="2" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 6 2, 0 4" fill="black" />
    </marker>
  </defs>
</svg>

    <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="10" refY="3" orient="auto">

  <text x="245" y="90" font-size="12" font-family="Arial" fill="black">M</text>

<svg width="400" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Draw the coordinate plane -->
  <line x1="50" y1="200" x2="350" y2="200" stroke="black" />
  <line x1="200" y1="50" x2="200" y2="350" stroke="black" />
  <!-- Axes labels -->
  <text x="360" y="205" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">x</text>
  <text x="205" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">y</text>
  <!-- Draw the line segment AB -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="150" r="4" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="300" cy="250" r="4" fill="blue" />
  <line x1="100" y1="150" x2="300" y2="250" stroke="blue" />
  <text x="90" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">A(x₁, y₁)</text>
  <text x="310" y="260" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">B(x₂, y₂)</text>
  <!-- Draw and label the midpoint M -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="4" fill="red" />
  <text x="210" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">M((x₁+x₂)/2, (y₁+y₂)/2)</text>
  <!-- Dotted or dashed lines from the midpoint to axes -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="200" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="300" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <!-- Highlight equal parts AM and MB -->
  <line x1="100" y1="150" x2="200" y2="200" stroke="orange" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="300" y2="250" stroke="orange" stroke-width="2" />
  <!-- Optional distance labels -->
  <text x="150" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="orange">AM</text>
  <text x="250" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="orange">MB</text>
</svg>

<svg width="400" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Coordinate Axes -->
  <line x1="200" y1="0" x2="200" y2="400" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="0" y1="200" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Grid Lines -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="lightgray" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#grid)" />

  <!-- Plot Points (A and B) -->
  <!-- Point A: (-3, 2) -->
  <circle cx="140" cy="160" r="5" fill="red"/>
  <text x="130" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">A(-3, 2)</text>
  
  <!-- Point B: (3, -2) -->
  <circle cx="260" cy="240" r="5" fill="red"/>
  <text x="270" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">B(3, -2)</text>

  <!-- Line Segment AB -->
  <line x1="140" y1="160" x2="260" y2="240" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Midpoint -->
  <!-- Midpoint: (0, 0) -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="5" fill="green"/>
  <text x="210" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">M(0, 0)</text>

  <!-- Midpoint Formula -->
  <text x="20" y="30" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">
    Midpoint Formula: M = ((x₁ + x₂)/2, (y₁ + y₂)/2)
  </text>
  <text x="20" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">
    Calculation: M = ((-3 + 3)/2, (2 - 2)/2) = (0, 0)
  </text>

  <!-- Axes Labels -->
  <text x="380" y="215" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">x</text>
  <text x="210" y="15" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">y</text>
  
  <!-- Point Labels -->
  <text x="130" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">A(-3, 2)</text>
  <text x="270" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">B(3, -2)</text>
  <text x="210" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">M(0, 0)</text>

  <!-- Annotations -->
  <text x="50" y="350" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">
    The midpoint M divides segment AB into two equal parts.
  </text>
</svg>

  <!-- Y Axis -->
  <line x1="250" y1="50" x2="250" y2="450" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Step 2: Linear Equation - Example y = 2x + 3 -->
  <!-- Step 3: Plot the Y-Intercept -->
  <!-- Y-Intercept (0,3) transformed to SVG -->
  <circle cx="250" cy="150" r="4" fill="red"/>
  <text x="255" y="145" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">(0,3)</text>

  <!-- Next Point Using Slope (1,5) transformed to SVG -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="50" r="4" fill="red"/>
  <text x="305" y="45" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">(1,5)</text>

<svg width="500" height="500" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background Grid -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id="smallGrid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="lightgray" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#smallGrid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="gray" stroke-width="2"/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>

  <!-- Apply Grid -->

  <!-- 60 degrees -->

  <line x1="200" y1="0" x2="200" y2="400" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />

  <!-- Step 3: Mark Key Angles -->
  <!-- 0 degrees / 0 rad -->
  <text x="310" y="195" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">0° / 0 rad</text>
  
  <!-- 30 degrees / π/6 rad -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="287.5" y2="150" stroke="grey" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <text x="290" y="145" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">30° / π/6 rad</text>
  
  <!-- 45 degrees / π/4 rad -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="270.7" y2="129.3" stroke="grey" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <text x="273" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">45° / π/4 rad</text>
  
  <!-- 60 degrees / π/3 rad -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="250" y2="113.4" stroke="grey" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <text x="255" y="110" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">60° / π/3 rad</text>
  
  <!-- 90 degrees / π/2 rad -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="200" y2="100" stroke="grey" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <text x="205" y="95" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">90° / π/2 rad</text>

  <!-- Step 4: Highlight a Specific Angle (45 degrees / π/4 rad) -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="270.7" y2="129.3" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="280" y="135" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="blue">45° / π/4</text>

  <!-- Step 5: Project the Sine and Cosine Coordinates -->
  <line x1="270.7" y1="129.3" x2="270.7" y2="200" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <line x1="270.7" y1="129.3" x2="200" y2="129.3" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <text x="275" y="205" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">cos(θ)</text>
  <text x="185" y="135" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">sin(θ)</text>

  <text x="390" y="195" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">x</text>
  <text x="205" y="10" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">y</text>
  
  <!-- Additional Visualization: Function Transformations (Translation) -->
  
  <!-- Original sine function -->
  <path d="M 50 350 Q 100 200 150 350 T 300 350" stroke="black" fill="none" />
  <text x="50" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">y = sin(x)</text>

  <text x="50" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="purple">y = sin(x) + 3</text>

<svg width="800" height="400" viewBox="0 0 800 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <title>Diagram of Sine and Cosine Functions</title>
  <!-- Definitions -->
  <defs>
    <style type="text/css">
      .axis { stroke: black; stroke-width: 2; }
      .grid { stroke: lightgray; stroke-width: 1; }
      .sine { stroke: blue; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; }
      .cosine { stroke: red; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; }
      .text { font-size: 12px; fill: black; }
      .label { font-size: 14px; fill: black; }
    </style>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Axes -->
  <line x1="50" y1="200" x2="750" y2="200" class="axis"/> <!-- X-axis -->
  <line x1="400" y1="20" x2="400" y2="380" class="axis"/> <!-- Y-axis -->
  
  <!-- Grid Lines -->
  <g class="grid">
    <!-- Vertical grid lines -->
    <line x1="100" y1="20" x2="100" y2="380"/>
    <line x1="200" y1="20" x2="200" y2="380"/>
    <line x1="300" y1="20" x2="300" y2="380"/>
    <line x1="500" y1="20" x2="500" y2="380"/>
    <line x1="600" y1="20" x2="600" y2="380"/>
    <line x1="700" y1="20" x2="700" y2="380"/>
    <!-- Horizontal grid lines -->
    <line x1="50" y1="100" x2="750" y2="100"/>
    <line x1="50" y1="300" x2="750" y2="300"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Sine Wave -->
  <path class="sine" d="
    M50,200 
    C100,100 200,100 300,200 
    S500,300 600,200 
    S700,100 750,200" />
    
  <!-- Cosine Wave -->
  <path class="cosine" d="
    M50,100 
    C150,0 250,0 350,100

  <!-- Draw Grid -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id="smallGrid" width="10" height="10" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 10 0 L 0 0 0 10" fill="none" stroke="gray" stroke-width="0.5"/>

<svg width="800" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="800" height="400" fill="#f9f9f9" />

  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="20" y="30" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#333">Arithmetic Sequences</text>

  <!-- Define the Sequence -->
  <text x="20" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#555">
    An arithmetic sequence is a sequence of numbers with a constant difference 
    between consecutive terms.
  </text>
  <text x="20" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#555">
    Highlight: Common difference \(d\).
  </text>

  <!-- Horizontal Number Line -->
  <line x1="50" y1="160" x2="750" y2="160" stroke="#000" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="45" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#555">1st</text>
  <text x="145" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#555">2nd</text>
  <text x="245" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#555">3rd</text>
  <text x="345" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#555">4th</text>
  <text x="445" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#555">5th</text>

  <!-- Sequence -->
  <text x="45" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#339">a₁</text>
  <text x="145" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#339">a₁+d</text>
  <text x="245" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#339">a₁+2d</text>
  <text x="345" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#339">a₁+3d</text>
  <text x="445" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#339">a₁+4d</text>

  <!-- Arrows for common difference -->
  <path d="M60 170 Q70 160 80 170" fill="none" stroke="#f00" stroke-width="1.5" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <path d="M160 170 Q170 160 180 170" fill="none" stroke="#f00" stroke-width="1.5" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <path d="M260 170 Q270 160 280 170" fill="none" stroke="#f00" stroke-width="1.5" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <path d="M360 170 Q370 160 380 170" fill="none" stroke="#f00" stroke-width="1.5" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />

  <!-- Arrows label -->
  <text x="110" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#f00">+d</text>
  <text x="210" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#f00">+d</text>
  <text x="310" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#f00">+d</text>
  <text x="410" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#f00">+d</text>

  <!-- nth Term Formula -->
  <rect x="500" y="100" width="260" height="60" fill="#e0f7fa" stroke="#333" />
  <text x="525" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">
    \(a_n = a₁ + (n-1)d\)
  </text>
  <text x="525" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">
    Example: a₅ = a₁ + 4d
  </text>
  
  <!-- Real-life Example -->
  <text x="20" y="260" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">
    Real-life Example: Each building floor has 4 more bricks than the last.
  </text>

  <!-- Cumulative Sum -->
  <rect x="500" y="220" width="260" height="60" fill="#ffcdd2" stroke="#333" />
  <text x="525" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">
    \(S_n = \frac{n}{2}(a₁ + a_n)\)
  </text>
  <text x="525" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">
    Example: S₃, S₄
  </text>

  <!-- Arrowhead Marker -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="#f00" />
    </marker>
  </defs>
</svg>

<svg width="500" height="500" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="10" y="20" font-size="16" fill="black">Understanding Derivatives Through the Limit Definition</text>

  <!-- Coordinate Plane -->
  <line x1="50" y1="250" x2="450" y2="250" stroke="black" />
  <line x1="250" y1="50" x2="250" y2="450" stroke="black" />

  <!-- Function f(x) -->
  <path d="M 50 300 Q 150 100, 350 200" fill="none" stroke="#0074D9" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="360" y="190" font-size="12" fill="#0074D9">f(x)</text>

  <!-- Points A and B -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="200" r="3" fill="red" />
  <text x="130" y="190" font-size="12" fill="red">A (x, f(x))</text>

  <circle cx="250" cy="250" r="3" fill="red" />
  <text x="260" y="245" font-size="12" fill="red">B (x+h, f(x+h))</text>

  <!-- Secant Line -->
  <line x1="150" y1="200" x2="250" y2="250" stroke="#FF4136" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="200" y="220" font-size="12" fill="#FF4136">Secant Line</text>

  <!-- Tangent Line at A -->
  <line x1="120" y1="180" x2="180" y2="220" stroke="#2ECC40" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <text x="140" y="165" font-size="12" fill="#2ECC40">Tangent Line</text>
  
  <!-- Delta x and y >
  <text x="180" y="260" font-size="12" fill="black">Δx = h</text>
  <line x1="150" y1="250" x2="250" y2="250" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  
  <text x="110" y="225" font-size="12" fill="black">Δy</text>
  <line x1="150" y1="250" x2="150" y2="200" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />

  <!-- Arrow Marker -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="5" refY="5" orient="auto">
      <path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="black" />
    </marker>
  </defs>

  <!-- Limit Annotation -->

    <line x1="0" y1="250" x2="500" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Draw the Discontinuous Function -->
    <!-- Line for y = 1-x for x < 0 -->
    <line x1="0" y1="250" x2="250" y2="0" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Line for y = 3-x for x >= 0 -->
    <line x1="250" y1="0" x2="500" y2="250" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Solid circle for x < 0 -->
    <circle cx="250" cy="0" r="5" fill="blue"/>
    
    <!-- Open circle for x = 0 -->
    <circle cx="250" cy="250" r="5" fill="white" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>

    <text x="260" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="blue">f(x) = 1-x</text>
    <text x="370" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="green">f(x) = 3-x</text>
    <text x="260" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">Jump Discontinuity</text>

</svg>

  <!-- Background Grid -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="40" height="40" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 40 0 L 0 0 0 40" fill="none" stroke="lightgray" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>

  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#grid)" />

  <!-- Axes -->
  <line x1="200" y1="0" x2="200" y2="400" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="0" y1="200" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Continuous Portion: Line y = x/2 - 1 (continuous from x=-4 to x=0) -->
  <line x1="40" y1="140" x2="200" y2="200" stroke="blue" stroke-width="3"/>

  <!-- Discontinuous Portion: Jump at x = 0 -->
  <!-- Line before jump: y = x/2 (from x=0 to x=2) -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="280" y2="160" stroke="red" stroke-width="3"/>
  <!-- Open circle at x = 2 (just before the jump) -->
  <circle cx="280" cy="160" r="5" fill="white" stroke="red" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Line after jump: y = x/2 + 2 (from x=2 to x=4) -->
  <line x1="280" y1="80" x2="360" y2="40" stroke="red" stroke-width="3"/>
  <!-- Closed circle at x = 2 (value after the jump) -->
  <circle cx="280" cy="80" r="5" fill="red" stroke="red" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Labels for Axes -->
  <text x="380" y="215" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">x</text>
  <text x="210" y="15" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">y</text>

  <!-- Label at discontinuity -->
  <text x="290" y="110" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">Jump</text>

  <!-- Key Points of Continuity and Discontinuity -->
  <text x="185" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">(0, 0)</text>
  <text x="260" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">(2, 3)</text>

  <!-- Highlighted Discontinuity -->
  <line x1="280" y1="160" x2="280" y2="80" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
</svg>

<svg width="500" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <!-- Step 1: Draw Cartesian Coordinate System -->
    <line x1="50" y1="350" x2="450" y2="350" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
    <line x1="250" y1="50" x2="250" y2="350" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="10" refY="3" orient="auto">
            <path d="M0,0 L0,6 L9,3 z" fill="#000" />
        </marker>
    </defs>

    <!-- Step 2: Draw a Curve that is Concave Up -->
    <path d="M 100 300 Q 175 200, 250 300" fill="transparent" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />
    <text x="80" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="blue">Concave Up</text>

    <!-- Step 3: Draw a Curve that is Concave Down -->
    <path d="M 250 300 Q 325 400, 400 300" fill="transparent" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" />
    <text x="410" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">Concave Down</text>

    <!-- Step 4: Identify and Label Points of Inflection -->
    <circle cx="175" cy="250" r="4" fill="purple" />
    <text x="180" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="purple">Inflection Point</text>

    <circle cx="325" cy="350" r="4" fill="purple" />
    <text x="330" y="350" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="purple">Inflection Point</text>
    
    <!-- Step 5: Illustrate Slope at Various Points -->
    <line x1="125" y1="275" x2="150" y2="230" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
    <line x1="275" y1="330" x2="300" y2="380" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />

    <!-- Step 6: Key Explanation Text -->
    <text x="50" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">
        Concave Up: f''(x) > 0 - slope increases; curve bends upwards.
    </text>
    <text x="50" y="385" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">
        Concave Down: f''(x) < 0 - slope decreases; curve bends downwards.
    </text>
    <text x="50" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">
        Inflection Point: point where curve changes concavity.
    </text>
</svg>

<svg width="400" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <title>Polar Coordinates Diagram</title>
    <!-- Define the center of the polar coordinate system -->
    <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="1" fill="black" />
    <text x="205" y="195" font-size="12" fill="black">Origin (Pole)</text>

    <!-- Draw concentric circles -->
    <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="40" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="4" fill="none" />
    <text x="245" y="195" font-size="10" fill="black">r = 1</text>
    <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="80" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="4" fill="none" />
    <text x="285" y="195" font-size="10" fill="black">r = 2</text>
    <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="120" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="4" fill="none" />
    <text x="325" y="195" font-size="10" fill="black">r = 3</text>

    <!-- Draw polar axis (horizontal line) -->
    <line x1="0" y1="200" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="black" />
    <text x="370" y="215" font-size="12" fill="black">Polar Axis</text>

    <!-- Draw radial lines at increments of π/6 radians (30 degrees) -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="gray" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    <text x="350" y="170" font-size="12" fill="black">0° / 0</text>
    <!-- π/6 (30 degrees) -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="345" y2="80" stroke="gray" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    <text x="350" y="70" font-size="12" fill="black">30° / π/6</text>
    <!-- π/4 (45 degrees) -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="330" y2="70" stroke="gray" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    <text x="335" y="60" font-size="12" fill="black">45° / π/4</text>
    <!-- π/3 (60 degrees) -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="270" y2="30" stroke="gray" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    <text x="280" y="20" font-size="12" fill="black">60° / π/3</text>
    <!-- π/2 (90 degrees) -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="200" y2="0" stroke="gray" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    <text x="210" y="10" font-size="12" fill="black">90° / π/2</text>

    <!-- Place a point P with polar coordinates, example (r=2, θ=π/4) -->
    <!-- location is subjective to r and θ, here shown for r=2, θ=π/4 -->
    <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="330" y2="70" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />
    <circle cx="330" cy="70" r="3" fill="red" />
    <text x="340" y="75" font-size="12" fill="black">P(r=2, θ=π/4)</text>

    <!-- Arc to represent angle θ -->
    <path d="M 240 200 A 40 40 0 0 1 330 70" fill="none" stroke="blue" stroke-width="1" />
    <text x="250" y="170" font-size="12" fill="black">θ</text>
</svg>

    <!-- Coordinate system -->

    <line x1="50" y1="50" x2="50" y2="450" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
    <text x="460" y="455" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">x</text>
    <text x="40" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">y</text>

    <!-- Function curve f(x) -->
    <path d="M 50 350 Q 150 150, 250 250 T 450 150" fill="none" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />

    <!-- Mark point x = a -->
    <line x1="250" y1="450" x2="250" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
    <text x="240" y="465" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">x = a</text>
    
    <!-- Mark point (a, f(a)) -->
    <circle cx="250" cy="250" r="4" fill="red" />
    <text x="260" y="245" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">(a, f(a))</text>

    <!-- Epsilon-delta band -->
    <!-- Epsilon band: [f(a) - epsilon, f(a) + epsilon] -->
    <line x1="50" y1="200" x2="450" y2="200" stroke="green" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4,4" />
    <line x1="50" y1="300" x2="450" y2="300" stroke="green" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4,4" />
    <text x="10" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">f(a) + ε</text>
    <text x="10" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">f(a) - ε</text>

    <!-- Delta band: [a - delta, a + delta] -->
    <rect x="200" y="100" width="100" height="350" fill="lightblue" opacity="0.3" />
    <line x1="200" y1="100" x2="200" y2="450" stroke="purple" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" />
    <line x1="300" y1="100" x2="300" y2="450" stroke="purple" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" />
    <text x="190" y="465" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">a - δ</text>
    <text x="310" y="465" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">a + δ</text>
    
    <!-- Enclose area and indicate the limit -->
    <ellipse cx="250" cy="250" rx="35" ry="50" fill="none" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,3" />
    <text x="50" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">L</text>
    <text x="260" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">lim_{x → a} f(x) = L</text>

    <!-- Arrows approaching x = a from left and right -->
    <line x1="150" y1="455" x2="248" y2="455" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
    <line x1="350" y1="455" x2="252" y2="455" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
    
    <!-- Define markers for arrows -->
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="0" refY="3" orient="auto">
            <path d="M0,0 L0,6 L9,3 z" fill="black" />
        </marker>
    </defs>
</svg>

<svg width="600" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="150" y="30" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">Visualization of Improper Integrals</text>
  
  <!-- Coordinate System -->
  <line x1="50" y1="350" x2="550" y2="350" stroke="black" />
  <line x1="300" y1="50" x2="300" y2="350" stroke="black" />
  
  <!-- X and Y Axis Labels -->
  <text x="545" y="345" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">x</text>
  <text x="305" y="55" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">y</text>
  
  <!-- Infinite Limit: f(x) = 1/x^2 -->
  <path d="M300,300 Q350,200 550,350" stroke="blue" fill="none" />
  <polygon points="300,300 300,350 550,350" fill="blue" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="400" y="320" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="blue">
    Improper Integral with Infinite Limit
  </text>
  <text x="370" y="285" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="blue">
    ∫ from 1 to ∞ of 1/x² dx
  </text>
  
  <!-- Infinite Discontinuity: f(x) = 1/√x -->
  <path d="M300,350 Q350,250 370,175" stroke="red" fill="none" />
  <polygon points="300,350 370,175 300,175" fill="red" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="310" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">
    Improper Integral with Infinite Discontinuity
  </text>
  <text x="320" y="245" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="red">
    ∫ from 0 to 1 of 1/√x dx
  </text>
  
  <!-- Axis Ticks and Labels -->
  <!-- X-axis Labels -->
  <text x="298" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">0</text>
  <text x="345" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">1</text>
  <text x="445" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">3</text>
  <text x="545" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">5</text>
  
  <!-- Special Annotations -->
  <text x="150" y="390" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">

  <!-- Coordinate Axes -->
  <line x1="50" y1="350" x2="550" y2="350" stroke="black" />
  <line x1="100" y1="400" x2="100" y2="50" stroke="black" />

  <!-- Function Graph f(x) -->
  <path d="M100,300 Q200,100 300,150 Q400,200 500,100" fill="none" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Interval [a, b] -->
  <line x1="150" y1="350" x2="150" y2="290" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <text x="145" y="360" fill="black">a</text>

  <line x1="400" y1="350" x2="400" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <text x="395" y="360" fill="black">b</text>

  <!-- Shaded area under the curve -->
  <polygon points="150,350 150,290 300,150 400,250 400,350" fill="lightblue" opacity="0.5"/>

  <!-- Antiderivative F(x) -->
  <path d="M100,320 Q250,170 500,60" fill="none" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="520" y="70" fill="green">F(x)</text>

  <!-- Tangent Line at c -->
  <line x1="250" y1="100" x2="350" y2="200" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <text x="240" y="90" fill="red">Tangent at c</text>

  <!-- F(b) - F(a) Arrow -->
  <line x1="150" y1="375" x2="400" y2="375" stroke="purple" />
  <polygon points="400,370 410,375 400,380" fill="purple" />
  <text x="250" y="395" fill="purple" font-size="14">ΔF = F(b) - F(a) = ∫[a,b] f(x) dx</text>

  <!-- Labels and Annotations -->
  <text x="180" y="250" fill="blue">f(x)</text>
  <text x="170" y="130" fill="black">Area under curve = ∫[a,b] f(x) dx</text>
  <text x="430" y="210" fill="black">Instantaneous rate of change F'(x) = f(x)</text>
</svg>

<svg width="600" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Unit Circle with Angles, Sine, and Cosine -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />
  <line x1="300" y1="100" x2="300" y2="300" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />
  <!-- 45 Degree Angle -->
  <line x1="300" y1="200" x2="370.71" y2="129.29" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="360" y="120" font-size="12" fill="black">45°/π/4</text>
  <!-- Sine and Cosine Projections -->
  <line x1="370.71" y1="200" x2="370.71" y2="129.29" stroke="blue" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <line x1="300" y1="129.29" x2="370.71" y2="129.29" stroke="green" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <text x="375" y="135" font-size="12" fill="green">cos(45°)=√2/2</text>
  <text x="305" y="125" font-size="12" fill="blue">sin(45°)=√2/2</text>
  <!-- Quadrants -->
  <text x="380" y="100" font-size="12" fill="black">I</text>
  <text x="220" y="100" font-size="12" fill="black">II</text>
  <text x="220" y="300" font-size="12" fill="black">III</text>
  <text x="380" y="300" font-size="12" fill="black">IV</text>
  <!-- Unit Circle Equation -->
  <text x="310" y="310" font-size="12" fill="black">x² + y² = 1</text>
  <!-- Scatter plots for Correlation Coefficients -->
  <!-- Perfect Positive Correlation -->
  <line x1="450" y1="350" x2="550" y2="250" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="470" cy="330" r="3" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="490" cy="310" r="3" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="510" cy="290" r="3" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="530" cy="270" r="3" fill="blue" />
  <text x="450" y="240" font-size="12" fill="blue">r = +1</text>
  <!-- Perfect Negative Correlation -->
  <line x1="450" y1="50" x2="550" y2="150" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="470" cy="70" r="3" fill="red" />
  <circle cx="490" cy="90" r="3" fill="red" />
  <circle cx="510" cy="110" r="3" fill="red" />
  <circle cx="530" cy="130" r="3" fill="red" />
  <text x="450" y="40" font-size="12" fill="red">r = -1</text>
  <!-- No Correlation -->
  <circle cx="470" cy="220" r="3" fill="grey" />
  <circle cx="490" cy="230" r="3" fill="grey" />
  <circle cx="510" cy="210" r="3" fill="grey" />
  <circle cx="530" cy="240" r="3" fill="grey" />
  <circle cx="550" cy="220" r="3" fill="grey" />
  <text x="450" y="210" font-size="12" fill="grey">r = 0</text>
  <!-- Line of Best Fit for Non-Perfect Corr -->
  <line x1="450" y1="380" x2="550" y2="280" stroke="purple" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4,4" />
  <text x="450" y="370" font-size="12" fill="purple">r = +0.8</text>
</svg>

  <circle cx="400" cy="240" r="4" fill="blue"/>

  <line x1="400" y1="240" x2="250" y2="240" stroke="gray" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>

  <!-- Step 5: Sample Calculation -->

    <linearGradient id="grad1" x1="0" x2="0" y1="1" y2="0">
      <stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:lightblue;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:lightyellow;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Normal distribution curve -->

           C 150,100 450,100 550,350" 
        fill="transparent" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <line x1="150" y1="350" x2="150" y2="190" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <line x1="300" y1="350" x2="300" y2="100" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="450" y1="350" x2="450" y2="190" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />

  <!-- Percentile labels -->
  <text x="140" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">P25</text>
  <text x="290" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="red">P50</text>
  <text x="440" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">P75</text>

  <!-- Descriptors -->
  <text x="50" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">
    P25 (1st Quartile): "25% of data points fall below this value."
  </text>
  <text x="160" y="395" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="red">
    P50 (Median): "50% of data points fall below this point."
  </text>
  <text x="350" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">

  </text>

  </text>

  <!-- Real-world context -->
  <text x="20" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">
    "If a student falls in the 70th percentile, they scored better than 70% of students."
  </text>

  <!-- Legend -->

<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">
    <!-- Step 1: Define Factorials -->
    <text x="50" y="30" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">Understanding Factorials</text>
    <text x="50" y="60" font-size="14">For any positive integer n, the factorial of n (denoted n!) is the product</text>
    <text x="50" y="80" font-size="14">of all positive integers less than or equal to n.</text>
    
    <!-- Step 2: Illustrate with Examples -->
    <text x="50" y="120" font-size="14" font-weight="bold">Examples:</text>
    <text x="70" y="150" font-size="14">1! = 1</text>
    <text x="70" y="170" font-size="14">2! = 1 × 2 = 2</text>
    <text x="70" y="190" font-size="14">3! = 1 × 2 × 3 = 6</text>
    <text x="70" y="210" font-size="14">4! = 1 × 2 × 3 × 4 = 24</text>
    
    <!-- Step 3: Visualize the Process -->
    <text x="50" y="250" font-size="14" font-weight="bold">Visualizing 5! as Steps:</text>
    <line x1="80" y1="270" x2="120" y2="270" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="100" y="265" font-size="14">1</text>
    <line x1="120" y1="270" x2="120" y2="310" stroke="black"/>
    <line x1="120" y1="310" x2="160" y2="310" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="140" y="305" font-size="14">2</text>
    <line x1="160" y1="310" x2="160" y2="350" stroke="black"/>
    <line x1="160" y1="350" x2="200" y2="350" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="180" y="345" font-size="14">3</text>
    <line x1="200" y1="350" x2="200" y2="390" stroke="black"/>
    <line x1="200" y1="390" x2="240" y2="390" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="220" y="385" font-size="14">4</text>
    <line x1="240" y1="390" x2="240" y2="430" stroke="black"/>
    <line x1="240" y1="430" x2="280" y2="430" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="260" y="425" font-size="14">5</text>
    <rect x="290" y="420" width="80" height="20" fill="#e0e0e0" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="300" y="435" font-size="14">5! = 120</text>
    
    <!-- Step 4: Illustrate Recursive Nature -->
    <text x="400" y="120" font-size="14" font-weight="bold">Recursive Nature:</text>
    <rect x="420" y="140" width="100" height="30" fill="#f0f0f0" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="425" y="160" font-size="14">5! = 5 × 4!</text>
    <rect x="440" y="180" width="80" height="30" fill="#d0d0d0" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="445" y="200" font-size="14">4! = 4 × 3!</text>
    <rect x="460" y="220" width="60" height="30" fill="#b0b0b0" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="465" y="240" font-size="14">3! = 3 × 2!</text>
    <rect x="480" y="260" width="40" height="30" fill="#909090" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="485" y="280" font-size="14">2! = 2 × 1!</text>
    <rect x="500" y="300" width="20" height="30" fill="#707070" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="505" y="320" font-size="14">1! = 1</text>
    
    <!-- Step 5: Highlight Special Cases -->
    <text x="50" y="480" font-size="14" font-weight="bold">Special Cases:</text>
    <text x="70" y="500" font-size="14">0! = 1</text>
    
    <!-- Step 6: Use arrows and flow -->
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
            <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="black"/>
        </marker>
    </defs>
    <line x1="130" y1="180" x2="150" y2="180" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)"/>
    <text x="155" y="185" font-size="14">Calculating 3!</text>
    <line x1="130" y1="540" x2="130" y2="560" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)"/>
    <line x1="130" y1="560" x2="180" y2="560" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)"/>
    <text x="185" y="565" font-size="14">Factorial used for permutations</text>
    
    <!-- Optional: Real World Context -->
    <text x="400" y="360" font-size="14" font-weight="bold">Real World Use:</text>
    <text x="420" y="380" font-size="14">Used in calculating permutations and combinations.</text>
</svg>

<svg width="500" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Draw the normal distribution curve -->
  <path d="M 50 250 Q 150 50, 250 250 T 450 250" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Mark the mean -->
  <line x1="250" y1="250" x2="250" y2="50" stroke="red" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="255" y="45" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">μ</text>
  
  <!-- Draw confidence interval lines -->
  <line x1="150" y1="250" x2="150" y2="100" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <line x1="350" y1="250" x2="350" y2="100" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  
  <!-- Label the interval endpoints -->
  <text x="140" y="260" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">\( \bar{x} - Z \times \frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}} \)</text>
  <text x="340" y="260" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">\( \bar{x} + Z \times \frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}} \)</text>
  
  <!-- Shade the confidence interval region -->
  <rect x="150" y="100" width="200" height="150" fill="lightblue" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Annotate the confidence level -->
  <text x="215" y="195" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">95% Confidence Interval</text>
  
  <!-- Optional alpha level shading -->
  <rect x="50" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="lightgray" opacity="0.4"/>

<svg width="300" height="250" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Define colors -->
  <defs>
    <style>
      .perm { fill: #79c7ff; stroke: #1a73e8; stroke-width: 2;}
      .arrow { fill: none; stroke: #333; stroke-width: 1.5; }
      .text { font: bold 14px sans-serif; fill: #333; }
    </style>
    <!-- Define arrowhead marker -->
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="10" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="#333" />
    </marker>
  </defs>

  <!-- Draw circles for elements -->
  <circle class="perm" cx="50" cy="50" r="20" />
  <circle class="perm" cx="150" cy="50" r="20" />
  <circle class="perm" cx="250" cy="50" r="20" />

  <!-- Draw arrows for permutations on upper row -->
  <line class="arrow" x1="70" y1="50" x2="130" y2="50" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <line class="arrow" x1="170" y1="50" x2="230" y2="50" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  
  <!-- Draw new permutation arrows for bottom row-->
  <line class="arrow" x1="250" y1="170" x2="250" y2="130" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <line class="arrow" x1="150" y1="170" x2="150" y2="130" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <line class="arrow" x1="50" y1="170" x2="50" y2="130" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />

  <!-- Draw circles for elements after permutation -->
  <circle class="perm" cx="50" cy="150" r="20" />
  <circle class="perm" cx="150" cy="150" r="20" />
  <circle class="perm" cx="250" cy="150" r="20" />
  
  <!-- Draw arrows for horizontal permutations in bottom row-->
  <line class="arrow" x1="230" y1="150" x2="170" y2="150" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <line class="arrow" x1="130" y1="150" x2="70" y2="150" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />

  <!-- Text labels for elements -->
  <text x="50" y="50" dy=".3em" class="text" text-anchor="middle">A</text>
  <text x="150" y="50" dy=".3em" class="text" text-anchor="middle">B</text>
  <text x="250" y="50" dy=".3em" class="text" text-anchor="middle">C</text>

  <!-- Permuted text labels after swaps -->
  <text x="50" y="150" dy=".3em" class="text" text-anchor="middle">B</text>
  <text x="150" y="150" dy=".3em" class="text" text-anchor="middle">C</text>
  <text x="250" y="150" dy=".3em" class="text" text-anchor="middle">A</text>

  <!-- Add curved lines to show swap movement -->
  <path d="M 50 50 C 50 100, 150 100, 150 50" fill="none" class="arrow" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <path d="M 150 50 C 150 100, 250 100, 250 50" fill="none" class="arrow" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <path d="M 250 150 C 250 200, 150 200, 150 150" fill="none" class="arrow" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <path d="M 150 150 C 150 200, 50 200, 50 150" fill="none" class="arrow" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
</svg>

            refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="black"/>
    </marker>
  </defs>

  <!-- Add a grid for better understanding of vector positions -->

    <line x1="0" y1="50" x2="300" y2="50" />

    <line x1="0" y1="150" x2="300" y2="150" />
    <line y1="0" x1="50" y2="200" x2="50" />
    <line y1="0" x1="100" y2="200" x2="100" />
    <line y1="0" x1="150" y2="200" x2="150" />
    <line y1="0" x1="200" y2="200" x2="200" />
  </g>

  <!-- Origin point -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="150" r="3" fill="black" />
  <text x="45" y="165" font-size="10" font-family="Arial" fill="black">O</text>

        marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <text x="90" y="130" fill="blue" font-size="12" font-family="Arial">A</text>

  <!-- Vector B translated parallel to illustrate the parallelogram method -->
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="100" y2="100" stroke="green" stroke-width="3"
        marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" stroke-opacity="0.5" />

  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="200" y2="50" stroke="red" stroke-width="3"
        marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <text x="110" y="30" fill="red" font-size="12" font-family="Arial">R = A + B</text>

  <!-- Auxiliary lines for parallelogram -->
  <line x1="150" y1="100" x2="200" y2="50" stroke="gray" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" />
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="100" y2="100" stroke="gray" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" />

</svg>

    <text x="460" y="40" fill="green" font-size="12">v' = [2x, 2y]</text>

    <text x="310" y="190" fill="orange" font-size="12">v'' = [0.5x, 0.5y]</text>

  <rect x="20" y="50" width="120" height="120" fill="none" stroke="black"/>
  <text x="40" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">a<sub>11</sub></text>
  <text x="90" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">a<sub>12</sub></text>
  <text x="40" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">a<sub>21</sub></text>
  <text x="90" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">a<sub>22</sub></text>
  <text x="80" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold">A</text>

  <!-- Determinant Calculation Arrows -->
  <line x1="40" y1="80" x2="90" y2="130" stroke="red" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="90" y1="80" x2="40" y2="130" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Determinant Formula -->
  <text x="160" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">
    det(A) = <tspan fill="red">a<sub>11</sub> × a<sub>22</sub></tspan> - <tspan fill="blue">a<sub>12</sub> × a<sub>21</sub></tspan>
  </text>

  <!-- Geometric Interpretation (optional) -->
  <line x1="350" y1="200" x2="450" y2="200" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  <line x1="350" y1="200" x2="400" y2="150" stroke="purple" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  <line x1="450" y1="200" x2="400" y2="150" stroke="gray" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <text x="410" y="185" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="gray">Area</text>

  <!-- Arrowhead marker definition -->

    <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="0" refY="3" orient="auto" markerUnits="strokeWidth">
      <path d="M0,0 L0,6 L9,3 z" fill="black"/>
    </marker>
  </defs>
</svg>

  <!-- Matrix representation -->
  <rect x="50" y="50" width="200" height="200" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="250" y2="150" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="150" y1="50" x2="150" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Matrix elements labels -->
  <text x="90" y="90" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">a</text>
  <text x="190" y="90" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">b</text>
  <text x="90" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">c</text>
  <text x="190" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">d</text>
  
  <!-- Main diagonal -->
  <line x1="60" y1="60" x2="240" y2="240" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  
  <!-- Secondary diagonal -->
  <line x1="240" y1="60" x2="60" y2="240" stroke="red" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="10,10"/>
  
  <!-- Determinant calculation formula -->
  <text x="50" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="black">
    det(A) = ad - bc
  </text>
  
  <!-- Parallelogram for geometric interpretation -->
  <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="220" y2="90" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="220" y1="90" x2="240" y2="240" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="240" y1="240" x2="170" y2="200" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="170" y1="200" x2="150" y2="150" stroke="green" stroke-width="2"/>
  <polygon points="150,150 220,90 240,240 170,200" fill="none" stroke="green" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
  
  <!-- Parallelogram area shading -->
  <polygon points="150,150 220,90 240,240 170,200" fill="rgba(0,255,0,0.2)"/>
  
  <!-- Properties demonstration notes -->
  <text x="50" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">
    If det(A) = 0, vectors are collinear.
  </text>
  <text x="50" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">
    Positive or negative det affects direction.
  </text>
  
</svg>

<svg width="500" height="500" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <style>
    .axis { stroke: #000; stroke-width: 1; }
    .vector { stroke: #f00; stroke-width: 2; }
    .eigenvector { stroke: #00f; stroke-width: 2; }
    .matrix { fill: none; stroke: #000; }
    .arrowhead { fill: #f00; }
    .eigenarrowhead { fill: #00f; }
  </style>
  <!-- Step 1: Matrix Representation -->
  <rect x="350" y="20" width="100" height="100" class="matrix" />
  <text x="360" y="50" font-size="14" fill="#000">a11</text>
  <text x="410" y="50" font-size="14" fill="#000">a12</text>
  <text x="360" y="90" font-size="14" fill="#000">a21</text>
  <text x="410" y="90" font-size="14" fill="#000">a22</text>

  <!-- Step 2: Linear Transformation -->
  <line x1="50" y1="250" x2="450" y2="250" class="axis" />
  <line x1="250" y1="50" x2="250" y2="450" class="axis" />
  
  <line x1="250" y1="250" x2="350" y2="150" class="vector" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <text x="355" y="145" font-size="12" fill="#f00">v</text>

  <!-- Step 3: Application of the Matrix -->
  <line x1="250" y1="250" x2="320" y2="350" class="vector" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <text x="325" y="355" font-size="12" fill="#f00">Av</text>

  <!-- Step 4: Eigenvector Concept -->
  <line x1="250" y1="250" x2="400" y2="400" class="eigenvector" />
  <text x="405" y="405" font-size="12" fill="#00f">u</text>

  <defs>
    <!-- Arrowhead marker for vectors -->
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" class="arrowhead"/>
    </marker>
    <marker id="eigenarrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" class="eigenarrowhead"/>
    </marker>
  </defs>

  <!-- Step 5: Eigenvalue -->
  <line x1="250" y1="250" x2="350" y2="350" class="eigenvector" stroke-dasharray="5,5" marker-end="url(#eigenarrowhead)" />
  <text x="355" y="355" font-size="12" fill="#00f">λu</text>

  <!-- Annotations -->
  <text x="270" y="230" font-size="10" fill="#000">x-axis</text>
  <text x="230" y="270" font-size="10" fill="#000">y-axis</text>
  <text x="50" y="480" font-size="12" fill="#000">Normal Vector: <tspan fill="#f00">v</tspan>, <tspan fill="#00f">Eigenvector: u</tspan></text>
</svg>

<svg width="400" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Coordinate Plane -->
  <line x1="200" y1="0" x2="200" y2="400" stroke="lightgray"/>
  <line x1="0" y1="200" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="lightgray"/>
  
  <!-- Vectors A and B -->
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="300" y2="200" stroke="blue" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <line x1="200" y1="200" x2="270" y2="270" stroke="green" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  
  <!-- Arrowhead Marker -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="6" refX="5" refY="3" orient="auto">
      <path d="M0,0 L0,6 L6,3 Z" fill="black" />
    </marker>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Components for Vector A -->
  <text x="250" y="190" font-size="12" fill="black">A_x</text>
  <line x1="300" y1="200" x2="300" y2="230" stroke="blue" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <text x="305" y="215" font-size="12" fill="black">A_y</text>
  
  <!-- Components for Vector B -->
  <text x="260" y="260" font-size="12" fill="black">B_x</text>
  <line x1="270" y1="270" x2="270" y2="200" stroke="green" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <text x="275" y="220" font-size="12" fill="black">B_y</text>
  
  <!-- Angle - theta -->
  <path d="M285,200 A85,85 0 0,1 270,270" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
  <text x="265" y="215" font-size="12" fill="black">θ</text>
  
  <!-- Dot Product Formulas -->
  <text x="10" y="20" font-size="12" fill="black">A · B = (A_x × B_x) + (A_y × B_y)</text>
  <text x="10" y="40" font-size="12" fill="black">A · B = |A| |B| cos(θ)</text>
  
  <!-- Special Cases -->
  <!-- Parallel Vectors -->
  <line x1="340" y1="50" x2="375" y2="50" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <line x1="340" y1="50" x2="360" y2="50" stroke="gray" marker-start="url(#arrow)" />
  <text x="380" y="55" font-size="10" fill="black">Parallel: Max Dot</text>
  
  <!-- Perpendicular Vectors -->
  <line x1="340" y1="80" x2="355" y2="95" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <line x1="340" y1="80" x2="355" y2="65" stroke="gray" marker-start="url(#arrow)" />
  <text x="360" y="85" font-size="10" fill="black">Perpendicular: Zero Dot</text>
  
  <!-- Opposite Vectors -->
  <line x1="340" y1="110" x2="375" y2="110" stroke="black" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <line x1="375" y1="110" x2="340" y2="110" stroke="gray" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <text x="380" y="115" font-size="10" fill="black">Opposite: Negative Dot</text>
</svg>

<svg width="400" height="400" viewBox="-2 -2 4 4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Unit Circle -->
  <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="1" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.05" fill="none" />

  <!-- Axes -->
  <line x1="-1.5" y1="0" x2="1.5" y2="0" stroke="grey" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <line x1="0" y1="-1.5" x2="0" y2="1.5" stroke="grey" stroke-width="0.02" />

  <!-- Common angles and their indicators -->
  <!-- 0 degrees -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="1" y2="0" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <text x="1.1" y="0.05" font-size="0.05">0°, 0</text>

  <!-- 30 degrees -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.866" y2="0.5" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <text x="0.9" y="0.55" font-size="0.05">30°, π/6</text>

  <!-- 45 degrees, highlighted -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="blue" stroke-width="0.03" />
  <text x="0.8" y="0.75" font-size="0.05">45°, π/4</text>

  <!-- 60 degrees -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.5" y2="0.866" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <text x="0.6" y="0.9" font-size="0.05">60°, π/3</text>

  <!-- 90 degrees -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <text x="0.05" y="1.1" font-size="0.05">90°, π/2</text>

  <!-- Annotation for 45 degrees intersection -->
  <circle cx="0.707" cy="0.707" r="0.02" fill="blue" />
  <text x="0.1" y="0.1" font-size="0.05"> (√2/2, √2/2) </text>

  <!-- Projection lines for 45 degrees -->
  <line x1="0.707" y1="0.707" x2="0.707" y2="0" stroke="green" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
  <line x1="0.707" y1="0.707" x2="0" y2="0.707" stroke="orange" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
  
  <!-- Cosine and Sine annotation -->
  <text x="0.65" y="-0.08" font-size="0.05">cos 45° = √2/2</text>
  <text x="-0.1" y="0.8" font-size="0.05">sin 45° = √2/2</text>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <rect x="-1" y="1.1" width="2" height="0.4" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01"/>
  <text x="-0.9" y="1.2" font-size="0.05">Red Lines: Angles in Degrees and Radians</text>
  <text x="-0.9" y="1.3" font-size="0.05">Blue Line: Highlighted 45° Angle</text>
  <text x="-0.9" y="1.4" font-size="0.05">Green Dashed Line: Cosine Projection</text>
  <text x="-0.9" y="1.5" font-size="0.05">Orange Dashed Line: Sine Projection</text>
</svg>

<svg width="400px" height="300px" viewBox="0 0 400 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <!-- Step 1: Draw a Matrix Representation -->
    <rect x="50" y="20" width="300" height="120" fill="none" stroke="black"/>

    <!-- Grid for 4x5 matrix -->
    <!-- Horizontal Lines -->
    <line x1="50" y1="50" x2="350" y2="50" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="50" y1="80" x2="350" y2="80" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="50" y1="110" x2="350" y2="110" stroke="lightgray"/>

    <!-- Vertical Lines -->
    <line x1="110" y1="20" x2="110" y2="140" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="170" y1="20" x2="170" y2="140" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="230" y1="20" x2="230" y2="140" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="290" y1="20" x2="290" y2="140" stroke="lightgray"/>

    <!-- Step 2: Highlight Linearly Independent Columns -->
    <!-- Highlight first, second, and fourth columns as independent -->
    <rect x="50" y="20" width="60" height="120" fill="rgba(0,128,0,0.3)" stroke="green"/>
    <rect x="110" y="20" width="60" height="120" fill="rgba(0,128,0,0.3)" stroke="green"/>
    <rect x="230" y="20" width="60" height="120" fill="rgba(0,128,0,0.3)" stroke="green"/>

    <!-- Step 3: Show Row Operations -->
    <!-- Arrows showing row operations -->
    <text x="200" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">Row Operations</text>
    <line x1="150" y1="140" x2="200" y2="160" stroke="gray" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)"/>
    <line x1="250" y1="140" x2="200" y2="160" stroke="gray" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)"/>
    
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
            <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="gray" />
        </marker>
    </defs>

    <!-- Step 4: Draw Matrix in Echelon Form -->
    <!-- Illustrating echelon form with pivot columns -->
    <rect x="50" y="180" width="100" height="80" fill="none" stroke="black"/>
    
    <!-- Echelon form, pivot markers -->
    <line x1="50" y1="210" x2="150" y2="210" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="50" y1="240" x2="150" y2="240" stroke="lightgray"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="180" x2="100" y2="260" stroke="lightgray"/>

    <!-- Pivot columns highlighted -->
    <path d="M 55 185 L 55 255 L 65 255 L 60 185 Z" fill="black"/>
    <path d="M 105 185 L 105 255 L 115 255 L 110 185 Z" fill="black"/>
    
    <!-- Step 5: Mark the Rank -->
    <text x="160" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">Rank = 2</text>

    <!-- Step 6: Visual Context of Applications -->
    <!-- Example matrices with full and deficient ranks -->
    <rect x="250" y="180" width="50" height="80" fill="none" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="260" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">Full</text>
    <text x="260" y="210" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">Rank</text>

    <rect x="310" y="180" width="50" height="80" fill="none" stroke="black"/>
    <text x="320" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">Rank</text>
    <text x="320" y="210" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">Deficit</text>

    <!-- Connections to Rank-Nullity Theorem -->
    <text x="50" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">Rank-Nullity: rank + nullity = n</text>
</svg>

    <line x1="0" y1="-2" x2="0" y2="2" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02"/>
    
    <!-- Common angles in degrees and radians -->
    <g font-size="0.1" text-anchor="middle">
        <!-- Labels at each key angle -->
        <text x="1.07" y="0.07" fill="black">0°, 0</text>
        <text x="0.87" y="0.5" fill="black">30°, π/6</text>
        <text x="0.71" y="0.71" fill="black">45°, π/4</text>
        <text x="0.5" y="0.87" fill="black">60°, π/3</text>
        <text x="0" y="1.1" fill="black">90°, π/2</text>
        <text x="-0.5" y="0.87" fill="black">120°, 2π/3</text>
        <text x="-0.71" y="0.71" fill="black">135°, 3π/4</text>
        <text x="-0.87" y="0.5" fill="black">150°, 5π/6</text>
        <text x="-1.1" y="0" fill="black">180°, π</text>
        <text x="-0.87" y="-0.5" fill="black">210°, 7π/6</text>
        <text x="-0.71" y="-0.71" fill="black">225°, 5π/4</text>
        <text x="-0.5" y="-0.87" fill="black">240°, 4π/3</text>
        <text x="0" y="-1.1" fill="black">270°, 3π/2</text>
        <text x="0.5" y="-0.87" fill="black">300°, 5π/3</text>
        <text x="0.71" y="-0.71" fill="black">315°, 7π/4</text>
        <text x="0.87" y="-0.5" fill="black">330°, 11π/6</text>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Highlight 45 degree line -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.03"/>
    
    <!-- Coordinate projections for 45 degrees -->
    <line x1="0.707" y1="0" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="blue" stroke-dasharray="0.02"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="0.707" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="blue" stroke-dasharray="0.02"/>
    
    <!-- Coordinate labels for 45 degrees -->
    <text x="0.75" y="0.735" font-size="0.1" fill="blue">\( (\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}) \)</text>
    
    <!-- Radius annotation -->
    <line x1="0.5" y1="0.3535" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="green" stroke-width="0.02" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)"/>
    <text x="0.5" y="0.25" font-size="0.1" fill="green">1</text>
    
    <!-- Legend -->
    <text x="-1.9" y="1.7" font-size="0.1" fill="black">x = cos(θ), y = sin(θ)</text>
    
    <!-- Arrow Marker -->
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
            <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="green"/>
        </marker>
    </defs>
</svg>

<svg width="600" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Step 1: Initial Graph -->
  <!-- Nodes -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="50" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="250" cy="100" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Edges with weights -->
  <line x1="50" y1="100" x2="150" y2="50" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="90" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">4</text>

  <line x1="50" y1="100" x2="150" y2="150" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="90" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">3</text>

  <line x1="150" y1="50" x2="250" y2="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="200" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">2</text>

  <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="250" y2="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="200" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">5</text>

  <line x1="150" y1="50" x2="150" y2="150" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="160" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">1</text>

  <!-- Node Labels -->
  <text x="40" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">A</text>
  <text x="140" y="55" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">B</text>
  <text x="140" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">C</text>
  <text x="240" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">D</text>

  <!-- Step 2: Kruskal's Algorithm Progression -->
  <text x="50" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">Step 1: Select shortest edge (B-C)</text>
  <line x1="150" y1="50" x2="150" y2="150" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" />

  <text x="50" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">Step 2: Add edge (B-D)</text>
  <line x1="150" y1="50" x2="250" y2="100" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" />

  <text x="50" y="240" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">Step 3: Add edge (A-C)</text>
  <line x1="50" y1="100" x2="150" y2="150" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" />

  <!-- Highlight the final MST -->
  <text x="400" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="black">Final MST</text>
  
  <!-- Nodes in final MST -->
  <circle cx="400" cy="100" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="500" cy="50" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="500" cy="150" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="600" cy="100" r="20" fill="lightgray" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Final MST edges -->
  <line x1="500" y1="50" x2="500" y2="150" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" />
  <line x1="500" y1="50" x2="600" y2="100" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" />
  <line x1="400" y1="100" x2="500" y2="150" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" />

  <!-- Node Labels in final MST -->
  <text x="390" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">A</text>
  <text x="490" y="55" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">B</text>
  <text x="490" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">C</text>
  <text x="590" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">D</text>
</svg>

  <line x1="280" y1="250" x2="370" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Highlight traversal path (DFS Order: A, B, C, F, E, D) -->
  <!-- Start from A -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="30" fill="#90ee90" stroke="#004400" stroke-width="3"/>
  <text x="90" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">A</text>

  <line x1="400" y1="130" x2="400" y2="220" stroke="#90ee90" stroke-width="3" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  
  <!-- Backtrack to C, then to B, and move to E -->

  <text x="240" y="255" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="black">E</text>

  <!-- Step 1: Basic Graph Structure with Vertices Placement -->
  <!-- Optional light grid for layout aid -->

  <!-- Vertices -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="100" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="200" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="300" cy="300" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="400" cy="300" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="400" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="100" cy="300" r="10" fill="blue" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="400" r="10" fill="blue" />

  <!-- Step 2: Connecting the Vertices with Edges -->
  <!-- Connected component 1 -->
  <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="200" y2="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="150" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="200" y1="100" x2="150" y2="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="150" y1="200" x2="100" y2="300" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Connected component 2 -->
  <line x1="300" y1="300" x2="400" y2="300" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="400" y1="300" x2="350" y2="400" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Disconnected Vertex -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="400" r="10" fill="red" />

  <!-- Step 4: Annotate standout elements -->
  <!-- Highlight a bridge -->
  <line x1="150" y1="200" x2="300" y2="300" stroke="orange" stroke-width="4" stroke-dasharray="4" />

  <!-- Step 5: Define Path Examples -->
  <!-- Highlighted path -->
  <line x1="300" y1="300" x2="400" y2="300" stroke="purple" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="4" />

  <!-- Step 6: Special Types of Graphs -->
  <!-- Connected graph annotation -->
  <text x="10" y="20" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">
    Connected Graph: All vertices are mutually reachable.
  </text>
  
  <!-- Disconnected graph annotation -->
  <text x="10" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="red">
    Disconnected Graph: Isolated components exist.
  </text>
  
  <!-- Additional explanation -->
  <text x="10" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">
    Bridge edges and articulation points are crucial for connectivity.
  </text>
</svg>
