  <!-- Step 1: Create a Grid for Numeric Representation -->
  <g>
    <rect x="50" y="50" width="100" height="200" fill="#f0f0f0" stroke="#000" />
    <rect x="150" y="50" width="100" height="200" fill="#f0f0f0" stroke="#000" />
    <rect x="250" y="50" width="100" height="200" fill="#f0f0f0" stroke="#000" />
    <rect x="350" y="50" width="100" height="200" fill="#f0f0f0" stroke="#000" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Step 2: Label Each Column -->
  <g font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#000">
    <text x="80" y="40" text-anchor="middle">Thousands</text>
    <text x="180" y="40" text-anchor="middle">Hundreds</text>
    <text x="280" y="40" text-anchor="middle">Tens</text>
    <text x="380" y="40" text-anchor="middle">Ones</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Step 3: Example Number Breakdown -->
  <text x="50" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#000">
    Example Number: 4,536
  </text>
  
  <!-- Step 4: Align Digits in the Grid -->
  <g>
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="30" fill="#cce5ff" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="100" r="30" fill="#cce5ff" />
    <circle cx="300" cy="100" r="30" fill="#cce5ff" />
    <circle cx="400" cy="100" r="30" fill="#cce5ff" />
    
    <text x="100" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#000" text-anchor="middle">4</text>
    <text x="200" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#000" text-anchor="middle">5</text>
    <text x="300" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#000" text-anchor="middle">3</text>
    <text x="400" y="105" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#000" text-anchor="middle">6</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Step 5: Assign Value to Each Digit -->
  <g font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#000">
    <text x="100" y="150" text-anchor="middle">= 4,000</text>
    <text x="200" y="150" text-anchor="middle">= 500</text>
    <text x="300" y="150" text-anchor="middle">= 30</text>
    <text x="400" y="150" text-anchor="middle">= 6</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Step 6: Wrap-up with a Value Equation -->
  <text x="50" y="350" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#000">
    4,536 = 4,000 + 500 + 30 + 6
  </text>
  
  <!-- Step 7: Additional Features (optional interactive arrows) -->
  <path d="M 290 130 Q 300 160 310 130" stroke="#000" fill="none"/>
  <text x="250" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ff3300">
    3 x 10
  </text>
</svg>

  <!-- Division Bracket -->
  <line x1="20" y1="70" x2="130" y2="70" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="60" y1="70" x2="60" y2="130" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>

  <text x="70" y="65" font-family="Verdana" font-size="20">726</text> <!-- Dividend -->
  
  <!-- Quotient Area (Result Above Line) -->
  <text x="70" y="50" font-family="Verdana" font-size="20">242</text> <!-- Result -->
  
  <!-- Step 1: Divide 7 by 3 -->
  <text x="20" y="130" font-family="Verdana" font-size="20" fill="blue">6</text> <!-- 2x3 -->
  <line x1="25" y1="135" x2="25" y2="150" stroke="red" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="15" y="160" font-family="Verdana" font-size="20" fill="blue">1</text> <!-- Remainder 1 -->
  
  <!-- Arrow (720) -->
  <line x1="40" y1="115" x2="40" y2="180" stroke="blue" stroke-width="1" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/>
  
  <!-- Step 2: Bring Down 2 -->

  <text x="55" y="240" font-family="Verdana" font-size="20" fill="blue">0</text> <!-- Remainder 0 -->

  <!-- Step 3: Bring Down 6 -->

  <!-- Step 3: Divide 6 by 3 -->

  <text x="55" y="320" font-family="Verdana" font-size="20" fill="blue">0</text> <!-- Remainder 0 -->
  
  <!-- Final Result Display -->

  <!-- Caption -->

<svg width="500" height="500" viewBox="-2 -2 4 4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Step 1: Draw the Unit Circle -->
  <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="1" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" />
  
  <!-- Step 2: Display the X-axis and Y-axis -->
  <line x1="-1.5" y1="0" x2="1.5" y2="0" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <line x1="0" y1="1.5" x2="0" y2="-1.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <text x="1.5" y="0.05" font-size="0.1" fill="black">x-axis</text>
  <text x="0.05" y="-1.5" font-size="0.1" fill="black">y-axis</text>

  <!-- Step 3: Mark Key Angles -->
  <!-- Marking only a few for simplicity, can be extended -->
  <text x="1.05" y="0.05" font-size="0.1" fill="black">0°</text>
  <text x="0.7" y="-0.7" font-size="0.1" fill="black" transform="rotate(-45 0.7 -0.7)">45°</text>
  <text x="0.05" y="-1.05" font-size="0.1" fill="black">90°</text>
  <text x="-1.05" y="0.05" font-size="0.1" fill="black">180°</text>
  <text x="0.05" y="1.1" font-size="0.1" fill="black">270°</text>

  <!-- Step 4: Demonstrate Sine and Cosine for 30 degrees (π/6) -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.866" y2="0.5" stroke="blue" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <text x="0.9" y="0.55" font-size="0.1" fill="black">P(√3/2, 1/2)</text>

  <!-- Step 5: Visualize Cosine and Sine -->
  <line x1="0.866" y1="0.5" x2="0.866" y2="0" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="0.02" />
  <line x1="0" y1="0.5" x2="0.866" y2="0.5" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="0.02" />
  
  <!-- Triangle for Right Triangle Concept -->
  <polygon points="0,0 1,0 1,1" fill="none" stroke="green" stroke-width="0.02" />
  <text x="0.5" y="-0.05" font-size="0.1" fill="green">a</text>
  <text x="1.05" y="0.5" font-size="0.1" fill="green">b</text>
  <text x="0.5" y="0.55" font-size="0.1" fill="green">c</text>
  <text x="0.92" y="0.08" font-size="0.1" fill="green">θ</text>
  <text x="1.1" y="1.1" font-size="0.15" fill="green">a² + b² = c²</text>
</svg>

<svg width="800" height="500" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Unit Circle Diagram -->
  <g transform="translate(200,250)">
    <!-- Draw the Circle -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="100" fill="none" stroke="black" />
    
    <!-- X and Y Axes -->
    <line x1="-150" y1="0" x2="150" y2="0" stroke="black" />
    <line x1="0" y1="-150" x2="0" y2="150" stroke="black" />
    
    <!-- Common Angles -->
    <text x="105" y="0" font-size="10" fill="black">0° / 0</text>
    <text x="86.6" y="-50" font-size="10" fill="black">30° / π/6</text>
    <text x="70" y="-70" font-size="10" fill="black">45° / π/4</text>
    <text x="50" y="-86.6" font-size="10" fill="black">60° / π/3</text>
    <text x="0" y="-110" font-size="10" fill="black">90° / π/2</text>
    <text x="-60" y="-86.6" font-size="10" fill="black">120° / 2π/3</text>
    <text x="-86.6" y="-50" font-size="10" fill="black">135° / 3π/4</text>
    <text x="-110" y="0" font-size="10" fill="black">180° / π</text>
    <text x="0" y="110" font-size="10" fill="black">270° / 3π/2</text>
    <text x="105" y="0" font-size="10" fill="black">360° / 2π</text>
    
    <!-- Highlight Specific Angle 30° -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="86.6" y2="-50" stroke="blue" />
    <line x1="86.6" y1="-50" x2="86.6" y2="0" stroke="red" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    <line x1="86.6" y1="-50" x2="0" y2="-50" stroke="green" stroke-dasharray="4" />
    
    <!-- Triangle Labels -->
    <text x="40" y="-25" font-size="12" fill="blue">r=1</text>

    <text x="-20" y="-30" font-size="12" fill="green">sin(30°)</text>

  <!-- Music Preferences Data Table -->

<svg width="400" height="400" viewBox="-2 -2 4 4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Circle -->
  <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="1" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.02" fill="none" />

  <!-- Axes -->
  <line x1="-1.5" y1="0" x2="1.5" y2="0" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <line x1="0" y1="-1.5" x2="0" y2="1.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" />

  <!-- Angle lines and labels -->
  <g font-size="0.08" fill="black" text-anchor="middle">
    <!-- 0°/0 radians -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="1" y2="0" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
    <text x="1.1" y="0.05">0°/0</text>
    
    <!-- 30°/π/6 radians -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.866" y2="0.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
    <text x="0.95" y="0.55">30°/π/6</text>

    <!-- 45°/π/4 radians -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
    <text x="0.8" y="0.8">45°/π/4</text>

    <!-- 60°/π/3 radians -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.5" y2="0.866" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
    <text x="0.6" y="0.95">60°/π/3</text>

    <!-- 90°/π/2 radians -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
    <text x="0.1" y="1.1">90°/π/2</text>
  </g>

  <!-- Example trigonometric line for 45°/π/4 -->
  <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0.707" y2="0.707" stroke="blue" stroke-width="0.01" />
  <line x1="0.707" y1="0.707" x2="0.707" y2="0" stroke="red" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
  <line x1="0.707" y1="0.707" x2="0" y2="0.707" stroke="green" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />

  <!-- Labels for sin and cos -->
  <text x="0.72" y="0" font-size="0.08" fill="red">cos(π/4)=√2/2</text>
  <text x="0" y="0.75" font-size="0.08" fill="green">sin(π/4)=√2/2</text>

  <!-- Point on the circle (45°/π/4) -->
  <circle cx="0.707" cy="0.707" r="0.02" fill="purple" />
  <text x="0.8" y="0.7" font-size="0.08" fill="purple">(√2/2, √2/2)</text>

  <!-- Random plotted point A -->
  <circle cx="0.5" cy="0.3" r="0.02" fill="orange" />
  <text x="0.55" y="0.3" font-size="0.08" fill="orange">A(0.5, 0.3)</text>
  <line x1="0.5" y1="0.3" x2="0.5" y2="0" stroke="orange" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
  <line x1="0.5" y1="0.3" x2="0" y2="0.3" stroke="orange" stroke-width="0.01" stroke-dasharray="0.02,0.02" />
</svg>

  </defs>
</svg>

<svg width="800" height="250" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Number Line -->
  <line x1="50" y1="100" x2="750" y2="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  <!-- Whole Numbers -->
  <text x="50" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">3</text>
  <text x="150" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">4</text>
  <text x="250" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">5</text>
  <!-- Decimal Increments -->
  <line x1="90" y1="95" x2="90" y2="105" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="87" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">3.1</text>
  <line x1="130" y1="95" x2="130" y2="105" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="127" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">3.2</text>
  <line x1="170" y1="95" x2="170" y2="105" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="167" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">3.3</text>
  <line x1="210" y1="95" x2="210" y2="105" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="207" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="black">3.4</text>
  <!-- Decimal Number to Round -->
  <circle cx="140" cy="90" r="5" fill="red" />
  <text x="130" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">3.46</text>
  <!-- Halfway Point -->
  <line x1="180" y1="90" x2="180" y2="110" stroke="blue" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4" />
  <text x="175" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="blue">3.5</text>
  <!-- Indicating Arrows for Rounding Direction -->
  <line x1="140" y1="50" x2="110" y2="85" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <line x1="180" y1="50" x2="210" y2="85" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" />
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="0" refY="3" orient="auto" markerUnits="strokeWidth">
      <path d="M0,0 L0,6 L9,3 Z" fill="green" />
    </marker>
  </defs>
  <!-- Example Notes -->
  <text x="50" y="20" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="black">Round 3.46 to nearest whole: </text>
  <text x="50" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">Below 3.5 -> Round down to 3</text>
  <text x="50" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">Above 3.5 -> Round up to 4</text>
  <!-- Practice Sections -->
  <rect x="300" y="160" width="100" height="50" fill="#e6e6e6" />
  <text x="310" y="185" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">Practice Area</text>
</svg>

<svg width="500" height="200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Number Line -->
  <line x1="50" y1="100" x2="450" y2="100" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Tick Marks and Labels for Tens -->
  <text x="40" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">10</text>
  <line x1="50" y1="90" x2="50" y2="110" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <text x="140" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">20</text>
  <line x1="150" y1="90" x2="150" y2="110" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <text x="240" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">30</text>
  <line x1="250" y1="90" x2="250" y2="110" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <text x="340" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">40</text>
  <line x1="350" y1="90" x2="350" y2="110" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <text x="440" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">50</text>
  <line x1="450" y1="90" x2="450" y2="110" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" />

  <!-- Original Number (e.g., 34) -->
  <circle cx="290" cy="100" r="8" fill="red" />
  <text x="280" y="75" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="red">34</text>

  <!-- Rounding Down Arrow -->
  <line x1="290" y1="130" x2="250" y2="130" stroke="blue" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <text x="260" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="blue">Rounds down to 30</text>

  <!-- Rounding Up Arrow -->
  <line x1="290" y1="130" x2="350" y2="130" stroke="green" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)" />
  <text x="300" y="175" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="green">Would round up to 40 if ≥ 35</text>

  <!-- Arrowhead Definition -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="0" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="black" />
    </marker>
  </defs>

  <!-- Midpoint Annotation -->
  <text x="295" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="black">35</text>

  <!-- Rounding Rule Note -->
  <text x="50" y="30" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="black">Rounding: If ≥ 5, round up. If < 5, round down.</text>
</svg>
Self Reflection:
<svg width="300" height="200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <style>
        .number { font: bold 16px sans-serif; fill: #000; }
        .circle { fill: #87ceeb; stroke: #000; stroke-width: 1; }
        .line { stroke: #000; stroke-width: 1; }
        .arrowhead { fill: #000; }
        .context-label { font: italic 13px sans-serif; fill: #555; }
    </style>
    
    <!-- Number Line -->
    <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="250" y2="150" class="line" />
    <polyline points="250,150 245,145 245,155" class="arrowhead" /> <!-- Arrow at the end -->
    
    <!-- Key Numbers -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="150" r="3" class="circle" />
    <text x="45" y="165" class="number">0</text>
    <line x1="50" y1="144" x2="50" y2="156" class="line" />

    <circle cx="100" cy="150" r="3" class="circle" />
    <text x="95" y="165" class="number">10</text>
    <line x1="100" y1="144" x2="100" y2="156" class="line" />
    
    <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="3" class="circle" />
    <text x="145" y="165" class="number">15</text>
    <line x1="150" y1="144" x2="150" y2="156" class="line" />
    
    <circle cx="200" cy="150" r="3" class="circle" />
    <text x="195" y="165" class="number">20</text>
    <line x1="200" y1="144" x2="200" y2="156" class="line" />
    
    <circle cx="250" cy="150" r="3" class="circle" />
    <text x="245" y="165" class="number">25</text>
    <line x1="250" y1="144" x2="250" y2="156" class="line" />
    
    <!-- Example Number -->
    <circle cx="170" cy="150" r="5" class="circle" fill="#ffcccb" />
    <text x="165" y="170" class="number">17</text>
    <line x1="170" y1="155" x2="170" y2="130" class="line" stroke-dasharray="3, 3" />
    
    <!-- Rounding Arrows -->
    <line x1="170" y1="130" x2="150" y2="120" class="line" />
    <polyline points="150,120 155,125 145,125" class="arrowhead" />
    <text x="110" y="110" class="context-label">Round to 15</text>
    
    <line x1="170" y1="130" x2="200" y2="120" class="line" />
    <polyline points="200,120 195,125 205,125" class="arrowhead" />
    <text x="210" y="110" class="context-label">Round to 20</text>

    <!-- Improvement: Indicate midpoint at 17.5 -->
    <circle cx="175" cy="150" r="3" class="circle" fill="#ffcccb" />
    <text x="172" y="165" class="number">17.5</text>
    <line x1="175" y1="144" x2="175" y2="156" class="line" stroke-dasharray="1, 2" />
    <text x="165" y="185" class="context-label">Midpoint</text>

</svg>
